data.persona: I am a huge fan of deep sea exploration, but I take any chance I can get to go for a swim. I love the feeling of water and compete with my friends to see who can hold his breath the longest. I wish I were a fish, and dislike mountains.
data.description:
You are in the Bank.
This is a grassy area that surrounds much of the swamp.  It's a plain field with some trees nearby along with some rocks.
There's a muddy chute, a field, a swamp, a rock, a tree, and a bush here.
The bird and the turtles are here.

You are carrying a google.

data.short_motivation: I want to befriend the turtles of the bank before my next underwater adventure.
data.mid_motivation: I want to befriend as many sea creatures as I can in this bank.
data.long_motivation: I want to be the most reputable underwater adventurer in the realm.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield the google and acknowledge the turtles.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: get a few rocks from the bank to use as a bridge out into the water dropoff.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the turtles to their underwater lair.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield the water to create a magical air bubble around myself. I've always had this ability.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: follow the turtles into their underwater kingdom; the grandest kingdom I've ever seen.
